text: The 1981–82 NCAA Division III men's ice hockey season began in November 1981 and concluded on March of the following year. This was the 9th season of Division III college ice hockey. ==Regular season== ===Standings=== ==See also== * 1981–82 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey season * 1981–82 NCAA Division II men's ice hockey season ==References== ==External links== NCAA
title: 1981–82 NCAA Division III men's ice hockey season
